txt.en: Attention metalsmiths,\n\nSince the arrival of these enemies all throughout the Lone-lands, we have lost many tools, lives, and materials that assist us in our survival here. We require mining-picks and forester axes to help us collect the important trinkets that we trade for provisions. If you are capable of crafting such items, we would be greatly appreciative. Please, deliver these tools to Léoflac at the Ost Guruth encampment.
'Yes, this tool is of good quality. It will assist us in replenishing our diminished supplies once the threats to this land are removed.\n\n'Thank you for doing this.'
'Is there an undertaking that you are currently working on for the Eglain? Perhaps you should complete the order before returning to me....'
Reputation -- Tools of the Expert Explorer

Since the invasion of their land, the Eglain have lost many materials and tools necessary to sift through the ruins of the Lone-lands. They have put out a general call to collect mining picks and forester axes that will assist them in performing these tasks.
Collected tools of the expert explorer for the Eglain ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver the tools of the expert explorer to Léoflac

Craft and deliver tools of the expert explorer to Léoflac at the Ost Guruth encampment.\n\nThe Eglain have asked that tools of the expert explorer be crafted and delivered to assist them in their efforts to survive in the harsh climate of the lone-lands.
Collect tools of the expert explorer for the Eglain ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
